title: What is the Roland Garros tennis schedule?
description: Roland Garros continues on Monday in Paris, where the final fourth-round matches will be played. World No. 1 Jannik Sinner and three-time champion Novak Djokovic are among the stars who will try to earn a quarter-final spot. View the full order of play for Monday here and see featured matches below. Court Philippe-Chatrier From 11 a.m. [2] Coco Gauff vs. [20] Ekaterina Alexandrova [3] Jessica Pegula vs. Lois Boisson [6] Novak Djokovic vs. Cameron Norrie  Night Session Not before 8:15 p.m. [1] Jannik Sinner vs. [17] Andrey Rublev Court Suzanne-Lenglen From 11 a.m. [6] Mirra Andreeva vs. [17] Daria Kasaktina [3] Alexander Zverev vs. Tallon Griekspoor [7] Madison Keys vs. Hailey Baptiste [5] Jack Draper vs. Alexander Bublik View Full Order Of Play Here [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Roland Garros

Sinner, Djokovic in action Monday

June 01, 2025

Dimitar Dilkoff/AFP via Getty Images

Roland Garros runs from 25 May-8 June. By ATP Staff

Roland Garros continues on Monday in Paris, where the final fourth-round matches will be played. World No. 1 Jannik Sinner and three-time champion Novak Djokovic are among the stars who will try to earn a quarter-final spot.

View the full order of play for Monday here and see featured matches below.

Court Philippe-Chatrier
From 11 a.m.
[2] Coco Gauff vs. [20] Ekaterina Alexandrova
[3] Jessica Pegula vs. Lois Boisson
[6] Novak Djokovic vs. Cameron Norrie 

Night Session
Not before 8:15 p.m.
[1] Jannik Sinner vs. [17] Andrey Rublev

Court Suzanne-Lenglen
From 11 a.m.
[6] Mirra Andreeva vs. [17] Daria Kasaktina
[3] Alexander Zverev vs. Tallon Griekspoor
[7] Madison Keys vs. Hailey Baptiste
[5] Jack Draper vs. Alexander Bublik

View Full Order Of Play Here
